D., Harvard, 1992 Office: MH 5234 Phone: 858-822-1179 keni@ucsd.edu My research is on quantum field theory, string theory, supersymmetry, and especially the exploration of novel aspects, phenomena, and interconnections of these theories at strong coupling.
